b1eced12b2be801d2f68de4e1f404e1c04b10ae8.commitMessage: Issue #3322: added RedundantModifiers for final in abstract methods

f66dcdbd9439aa413c6240287dadcc9ccf2c8ea3.commitMessage:
Issue #1530: Detect nested enums marked as static in RedundantModifier
check

07b24dd81c7648f093f2a789a7fa288d8e7eeef4.commitMessage:
Issue #1555: Fix various typos

Fixes some `SpellCheckingInspection` inspection violations.

Description:
>Spellchecker inspection helps locate typos and misspelling in your code, comments and literals.

da6ebe6de41b7a5afc6f6746ff0c2382c2a4be0f.commitMessage:
Detect public constructors in non-public classes in RedundantModifier,
fixes issue #1537

4d6e2376db89b69167de867bfc28f8d8624a6b78.commitMessage:
Move constants to left side of comparison. #1555

Fixes `ConstantOnLHSOfComparison` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports on comparison operations with constant values on their left-hand side. Some coding conventions specify that constants should be on the right-hand side of comparisons.

2f7481ee4e20ae785298c31ec2f979752dd7eb03.commitMessage:
Make RedundantModifier checks if enum constructor has redundant private
modifier, fixes part of #1242

ce59d6abb3385213248b188f5b80f9e9a2ca3507.commitMessage: Issue #1286: 'RedundantModifierCheck' was refactored, UT coverage improved

e030d1463c307836bbb201a202d15e81a41bcb0b.commitMessage: RedundantModifierCheck updated to follow Cyclomatic Complexity rule. #954

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

4ee80e78985574cd236662fef3266a3c4b24fea9.commitMessage: Redundant Modifier Check, fixed false-positive Redundant modifier final error for @SafeVarargs method issue #301

0aab6d6243c3675a978940eebb1f18a9d633929f.commitMessage: Redundant Modifier Check fixed bug with warning on final variables in default methods issue #364

373c90a1090537de5b8151c6088534a63744edb2.commitMessage: #282 fixed. Since Java 8 we can have methods body in interfaces.

cf3879aa537cc597ac74aa762ba89b15883a4b39.commitMessage: Fixed issue #29 Abstract Interface Should not be Allowed in RedundantModifier

70774706483eb0f9d04500cb64f4ce4c995b56f8.commitMessage: Enhanced RedundantModifier to support detecting inner interface declarations that are declared as static. Raised in bug #3222810.

d62a2cc02092cb6c1a1666630a51a6ec7c50a878.commitMessage: Inspired by patch# 2111354 - changes to remove casting. Neat trick

bc66e150c2654deb6dcf1806b02e8f816e533d83.commitMessage:
All these changes are because I wanted to fix a small documentation
bug. Ended up having to move the RedundantModifierCheck around.

3ed2fd68f81f6200362f4babc9595b29f437ddd9.commitMessage:
Enhanced RedundantModifier to check that all private methods and all methods in a
          final class do not contain modifier final (discussed in request 775011)

4b2f2e628d9423efee0bb720ad88aa8ab30b07fa.commitMessage: changed RedundantModifierCheck to allow token configuration and to simplify implementation

9a05522373905e39aa764009d1c543092c14f691.commitMessage:
response to rfe #651121, Redundant field modifiers in interface:
added final to list of redundant modifiers
improved tests RedundantModifierTest to cover constants

84eddc36730c1eca845257201c71a0d1fb2d40cf.commitMessage:
Added a new class TokenTypes that contains all the type constants. This class
breaks the circular dependencies - the cost is needing to maintain this class
when a new grammar is introduced.
